tagline: An anime/japanese-oriented streaming radio application for Windows 8/WinRT.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Hanasu
Hanasu is an anime/japanese-oriented streaming radio application for Windows 8/WinRT.


### Authors and Contributors
Hanasu is written by @Amrykid. Over time, I have had various testers. Some of them are:
* @Phalanxia
* @XAMPP

### Third party
Hanasu makes use of a sound effect from [Freesound.org](http://www.freesound.org/people/soundbyter.com/sounds/110429/). The specific sound effect was created by [soundbyter.com](http://www.freesound.org/people/soundbyter.com/).
### Support or Contact
Have a question? Feel free to contact me (Amrykid) on IRC. I idle on Freenode (irc.freenode.net) in ##XAMPP (note the two #s, not one).
name: Hanasu
